#summary Overview.

= Dependencies =

  * jquery.core 
  * jquery.ui.core.js
  * jquery.ui.widget.js


= Overview =

Make the selected element a Google map.

{{{
$(function() {				
    $('#map_canvas').gmap();
});
}}}

= API =

==Constructor==

|| *Constructor* || *Description* || 
|| gmap(opts?:[Overview#MapOptions MapOptions]) || Creates a new map. || 

==Methods==

|| *Methods* || *Return Value* || *Description* ||
|| addSidebar(panel:string/element, position:[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#ControlPosition ControlPosition]) || none || Creates a control from the given div panel on the map. ||
|| addMarker(markerOptions:[Overview#MarkerOptions MarkerOptions], callback?:function(map, marker)) || jQuery object || Creates a marker on the map. ||
|| addInfoWindow(infoWindowOptions:[Overview#InfoWindowOptions InfoWindowOptions], callback?:function(infowindow)) || jQuery object || Creates an info window bound to the marker on the map. ||
|| loadJSON(url:string, data?:string, callback?:function(iterator, marker)) || none || Adds markers to the map through a JSON request. The JSON format must be (["markers":[]]). ||
|| loadHTML(type:string, class:string, callback?:function(markerOpts, node)) || none || Adds markers to the map by looking for sementic attributes in the selected classes. Semantic types currently supported: 'rdfa', 'microformat' and 'microdata'. ||
|| loadDirections(panel:string/element, directionsOpts:[Overview#DirectionsRequest DirectionsRequest], successCallback:function(response), errorCallback:function(status)) || none || Displays directions on the map and/or in a div panel. ||
|| loadStreetViewPanorama(panel:string, opts?:[Overview#StreetViewPanoramaOptions StreetViewPanoramaOptions]) || none || Displays the panorama for a given LatLng or panorama ID. ||
|| loadFusion(id:string, fusionTablesLayerOptions:[Overview#FusionTablesLayerOptions FusionTablesLayerOptions]) || none || Adds markers from Fusion table. ||
|| search(request:[Overview#GeocoderRequest GeocoderRequest], successCallback:function(Array.[http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#GeocoderResult GeocoderResult]), errorCallback:function([http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#GeocoderStatus GeocoderStatus])) || none || Search addresses and latitude/longitude. ||
|| clearMarkers() || none || Clears all markers on the map. ||
|| getMap() || map || Returns the map. ||
|| getMarkers() || Array:marker || Returns an array of markers. ||
|| addBound([http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#LatLng LatLng]) || none || Adds a bound. ||
|| destroy() || none || Removes the map functionality. ||

===!MapOptions===

Supports all Google Maps [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#MapOptions MapOption] properties

|| *Properties* || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| callback || function || A callback routine invoked after the map has been loaded. Optional. ||

All properties in the [http://code.google.com/intl/sv-SE/apis/maps/documentation/javascript/reference.html#MapOptions MapOption] object can be set and retrieved by

{{{
//getter
var zoom= $('#map_canvas').gmap('option', 'zoom');
//setter
$('#map_canvas').gmap('option', 'zoom', 7);
}}}

see [http://dev.w3.org/geo/api/spec-source.html#position_options_interface GeoLocationOptions].
